work.description: Providing non-technical and technical staff with guidance on how to query large amounts of data stored with HDFS, managing ETL pipelines and enabling new data sources to be utilised. Responsible for creating and maintaining bespoke web interfaces for analysts.

Placed into multiple squads with tight deadlines and overhauled UIs / UX implementing new features to transition from on premise to SaaS and PaaS. Encouraged agile development such as pair programming and best practices regarding architecture and structure of the code base. Rapid development with constantly moving requirements.

Full stack developer working across many technologies and supporting multiple microservices. Innovated UI testing in the department and encouraged use across other squads. Delivered large amounts of new complex functionality in an award-winning UI, closely working with design team.

Developed new feature with third party open source library. Experiencing building code for multiple OS and integrating open source software into a large codebase. Part of innovation initiative to develop and improve systems and processes.
Display systems and controls for Typhoon, vehicular health and management system for F35. Implementing code to a very specific brief, extensive planning before developing and rigorous testing.
